text: Mario Severino Feleppa is a former Australian politician. He was a Labor member of the South Australian Legislative Council from 1982 to his resignation in 1995. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Members of the South Australian Legislative Council Category:Recipients of the Medal of the Order of Australia Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Australian Labor Party members of the Parliament of South Australia
title: Mario Feleppa
